summary: Ever wanted a library in Skyrim? well now you have it ;)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UEDMXtb.jpg[/img]

Title explains it all, this mod adds a library to Skyrim (that has a map marker). The library is currently in an alpha version and bugs are inevitable. If you happen to find a bug please report it in the comments or add a discussion topic in the discussion tab.

[b]V0.02:[/b]
-Added more rooms in the library!
-Added Yngvar the assistant!
-Added Basic dialogue and voice acting to Yngvar!
-Added Clutter
-Cleaned up Exterior of library slightly

[youtube]6vfznwS6Ve8[/youtube]
[b]Thanks to idanby for making this awesome video![/b]

[line]

[size=x-large][b]Where is The Library of Skyrim:[/b][/size]

The Library of Skyrim is located east of Dragons Bridge and south of the Karnsdale Farmhouse, map marker is available and image is provided in the image viewer above :)

Feedback would be great and would tremendously help the progression of this mod into something truly special!
-Thanks for the support, Pollyard

[line]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/wv3IP5I.jpg[/img]

More Dynamic Library staff
Player book "collecting quest" (still in the idea stage)
Librarian (voice acting may come later)
Roaming NPC's around the area and in the library.
More Clutter

[line]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/y63ogFB.jpg[/img]

This mod is compatible with most mods, including "Open Cities Skyrim" and "Interesting NPC's"

*NOTE* It is currently to early to tell which mods are compatible with The Library of Skyrim, if you find any mods incompatible please let me know so I can recognize the issue.
author: Pollyard
